title: Weather and Nature 2
sentences: ist nach dem Regen sehr breit.
The river is very wide after the rain.
We are watching the sunset by the sea.
The desert is a very dry place.
In diesem Park blühen viele bunte
In this park many colorful flowers are blooming.
des Berges ist mit Schnee bedeckt.
The summit of the mountain is covered with snow.
ist nur mit dem Boot erreichbar.
The island is only reachable by boat.
The children are playing on the meadow.
The ocean is incredibly deep and blue.
I collect beautiful stones on the beach.
There is a great drought in the region.
The moon is shining very brightly tonight.
The valley lies between two high mountains.
We are sitting on the bank/shore and fishing.
The view from up here is fantastic.
The ice age was many years ago.
Which season do you like best?
der Bäume ist im Sommer kühl.
The shadow of the trees is cool in summer.
am Meer sind heute sehr hoch.
The waves at the sea are very high today.
I like the grass between my toes.
A volcano can be very dangerous.
The brook ripples quietly in the forest.
The natural disaster destroyed a lot.
